citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 on
10/22/2015.
I was unable to make contact with you by phone at the site. I left my business card on your gate. Please contact
me and update your business hours. A facility representative shall be made available to accompany APHIS Officials
on unannounced inspections.
